item.title: R-Ladies East Lansing | Workshop on Intro to Tidy Data w/ R
R-Ladies East Lansing | Workshop on Intro to Data Visualization w/ R
Launching R-Ladies East Lansing!
item.description: Welcome to our new chapter! What we’re about R-Ladies East Lansing is a local chapter of R-Ladies Global. We meet to discuss, learn, teach, present, work on all things R! Our priority is to provide a safe community space for anyone identifying as a minority gender who is interested in and/or working with R. The group exists to promote gender diversity in the R community worldwide. We are pro-actively inclusive of queer, trans, and all minority identities, with additional sensitivity to intersectional identities.
